name: Thomas J. CAPALDI, a/k/a Robert Caponie, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Thomas J. CAPALDI, a/k/a Robert Caponie, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John Packel, Owen W. Larrabee, Philadelphia, for T.J. Capaldi.
Arthur R. Thomas, Harrisburg, for P.B.P.P.
casebody.head_matter:
633 A.2d 587
Thomas J. CAPALDI, a/k/a Robert Caponie, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued and Decided Oct. 19, 1993.
John Packel, Owen W. Larrabee, Philadelphia, for T.J. Capaldi.
Catherine Marshall, Philadelphia, for Com.
Arthur R. Thomas, Harrisburg, for P.B.P.P.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
